title: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
fullTitle: PL-400: Microsoft Power Platform Developer - Interactive Course
description: Comprehensive interactive course for the Microsoft Power Platform Developer certification. Learn to design, develop, secure, and extend Power Platform solutions including Dataverse, canvas apps, model-driven apps, Power Automate, and custom development.

certification.certificationName: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate

prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge (helpful but not required)
learningObjectives: Create technical designs for Power Platform solutions
Configure Microsoft Dataverse including data model, forms, views, and business rules
Create and configure Power Apps including canvas and model-driven apps
Configure business process automation using Power Automate
Extend the platform with custom development using Power Apps Component Framework (PCF)
Develop and register plugins for Dataverse
Integrate Power Platform with Azure services and third-party APIs
Implement security roles and manage environments

topics.name: Power Platform Fundamentals
topics.description: Overview of Power Platform and solution architecture principles

topics.name: Microsoft Dataverse
topics.description: Data modeling, tables, columns, relationships, and business logic

topics.name: Canvas Apps
topics.description: Building responsive canvas applications with Power Fx formulas

topics.name: Model-Driven Apps
topics.description: Creating forms, views, business process flows, and dashboards

topics.name: Power Automate
topics.description: Cloud flows, desktop flows, and automation scenarios

topics.name: Integrations
topics.description: Custom connectors and Azure integration patterns

topics.name: Custom Development
topics.description: PCF components, plugins, and custom APIs

topics.name: Security & Administration
topics.description: Security roles, environment management, ALM, and deployment

features: 24 interactive lessons covering all PL-400 exam topics
No installation required - runs in web browser

files.description: Main interactive course portal with lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking
Course documentation, usage instructions, and learning guide
